commits.message: Add dual payment gateway (Dodo + LemonSqueezy) and fake door validation
commits.author: shalombook

commits.message: Archive and delete duplicate Coming Late Squad from Vapi
commits.author: shalombook

commits.message: Archive and delete 15 old single-assistant scenarios from Vapi
commits.author: shalombook

commits.message: Add orphaned assistants to Vapi archive and delete from account
commits.author: shalombook

commits.message: Add backup of 6 deleted legacy Vapi assistants
commits.author: shalombook

panels.title: Add dual payment gateway (Dodo + LemonSqueezy) and fake door validation
panels.scene: Villagers celebrate in the marketplace, each holding two different coins with bird and lemon engravings. A fake door stands open, with confetti pouring out each time someone approaches it. Knight stands beside, arms crossed.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: Two gateways! I can pay with lemons or dodos!

bubbles.speaker: Knight
bubbles.text: It's just a backup payment option.

panels.title: Archive and delete duplicate Coming Late Squad from Vapi
panels.scene: Knight casually pushes several identical knights labeled 'Coming Late Squad' into a swirling vortex. Villagers cheer as the duplicates vanish. Banners reading 'Always Late, but not this time!' are raised.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: Gone! No more late squad clones!

panels.title: Archive and delete 15 old single-assistant scenarios from Vapi
panels.scene: A group of dusty scrolls labeled 'Old Scenario' burn in a bonfire. Villagers dance around the flames, shouting in victory. One villager raises a banner marked 'Single Assistant No More!'

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: Fifteen scrolls gone! We are free!

panels.title: 5 commits. 3 deletions. 2 backups added. 15 scrolls burned.
panels.scene: Knight sitting on a wooden stump, looking slightly tired. In the background, villagers construct a new monument of a flaming scroll with the Knight's face on it.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: We will name our sheep git-commit!
